dt-option.name: fixedHeader.header

type.description: Enable the fixing of the table header (`true`) or disable (`false`).

dt-option.description: This parameter simply provides the ability to enable or disable the fixed header aspect of the FixedHeader extension. When enabled the table's header will be _sticky_, so it will always be visible while the end user scrolls through a DataTables.

example.title: Disable the header, but enable footer
